topic.title: why does zero mail have 8 files that failed to update
topic.body:
why does zero mail have 8 files that failed to update?  how do i fix this or see what files need to be updated. 

edit:

it ACTUALLY got a full sync over time.

topic.title: I keep emailing echobot on zeromail but i get no response... what is going on?
topic.body: I keep emailing echobot on zeromail but i get no response... what is going on?

1531954504_15MSvLGP47HuCZY2MHo58zkB9qCjr.body:
> [blurhy](#comment_10_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): The bot is dead

is there any thing i can email to bounce back?

> [blurhy](#comment_11_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUtTpcK): You can email me.

OK done
